committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site in Oregon City, Oregon, and to administer the site as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
short_title: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act

summary.text: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site, Oregon City, Oregon, from willing sellers by donation, purchase, or exchange (except that lands or interests owned by Oregon City may be acquired by donation only). Requires that the acquired property be included within the boundaries and administered as part of the Fort Vancouver National Historic Site in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations of the National Park System.

titles.title: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act
McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site in Oregon City, Oregon, and to administer the site as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
